https://tmrev.io/movie/30150-Dream Theater: Live at Budokan 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/RwI0cesgSWbcvhmpOv295CqgXH.jpg Live at Budokan is a live recording released by progressive metal band Dream Theater on October 5, 2004, available on either 3 CDs or 2 DVDs. It was recorded at the Nippon Budokan Hall on April 26, 2004 in Tokyo, Japan. Dream Theater: Live at Budokan
